metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4305 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in contrib/example.php in the SyntaxHighlight GeSHi extension for MediaWiki, possibly as downloaded before September 2013, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the PATH_INFO.

criterions.comment: mediawiki-extensions: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
